ygData.subject: Re: RE: Mask of deception
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Bards! ... IF  you can enter neriak with the mask and cinda s charismatic carallion(I dont have one yet :() it might be possible to get to lokar tobiath
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Bards!

> > I am able to enter Ogguk without problems when I use the
> > guise of deception. The Bouncers con indifferent and the
> > merchants inside con amiable. I am a agnostic woodelf btw.
> > I picked this because thats what I am. I use the DE
> > illusion everytime I run through Ferrot or is resting
> > outside CZ.
>
> The mask is no-drop and (now) only usable by two classes.
> There are relatively easy (though time-consuming) ways to
> become non-KOS to virtually all the good races. I don't think
> anyone has figured out a way to raise your faction with the
> Neriak and Nektulos guards.

IF you can enter neriak with the mask and cinda's charismatic
carallion(I dont have one yet :()
it might be possible to get to lokar tobiath in the library (hes a
necro, one more problem hehe) and give him red wine (I think 40 should
raise 1 faction) for factions with inner and outer guards and
bargainers.
Im sure you dont want to die in neriak so this would be a very tough
task :)

bye
Tirc Stardancer
